name: camel
description: Playful and affectionate companion. Known for their ability to withstand long periods without water and navigate vast deserts.

name: goat
description: Active and curious animal. They are excellent climbers and are often found exploring rocky terrains.

name: sheep
description: Gentle and docile creature. They are commonly raised for wool and meat production.

name: cow
description: Peaceful and herbivorous mammal. Cows are often domesticated for milk and meat production.
